name: BUILD DEFENSE
description:
Game for 

GDevelop Game Jam #1 ATTENTION

"This project contains only the initial mechanics, it will be continued in the future."

Build Defense

In a post apocalyptic world, the human race was decimated by a meteor impact, leaving only machines, and those that over time were giving rise to new life forms, you are Alpha365 a creature in search of the enchanted battery.
